body:
Without further ado, the senior staff have decided BSM (Better Sprint Mod) is now allowed. Does that mean Toggle Sneak? No. BSM. Only BSM is allowed. Yes I said that, only BSM is allowed. 







But what does this mean?
body_tagged:
Without further ado, the senior staff have decided BSM (Better Sprint Mod) is now allowed. Does that mean Toggle Sneak? No. BSM. Only BSM is allowed. Yes I said that, only BSM is allowed. 







But what does this mean?
title: BSM n' Stuff

replies.body: Can someone tell me what exactly BS does?
replies.body_tagged: Can someone tell me what exactly BS does?

replies.body:
Makes it so you an toggle sprint/crouch.

Lets say you put r as your toggle sprint, it wil make it o you never stop sprinting, without having to hold the r button, all you have to do is press it once, then press it again so you can stop sprinting. This helps for people that have small hands, like me.
replies.body_tagged:
Makes it so you an toggle sprint/crouch.
